name: Wimp: Who Stole My Pants?
description: Go to catch the bad thief! Just explore in the awesome world!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 2000/XP/Vista Processor: AMD, Intel or G3 1000+ Mhz Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX Compatible 3D Graphics adaptor (ATI, NVIDIA, Intel, etc.) with 32 mb of video memory DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 700 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 2000/XP/Vista Processor: AMD, Intel, or G4 1500+ Mhz Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX Compatible 3D Graphics adaptor (ATI, NVIDIA, Intel, etc.) with 64 mb of video memory DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 700 MB available space

reviews.review_text: This game is very challenging and funny. It is fun and well made, plus it is a bigger game than I thought. I have not played it long but I could see how far there is to go.
Little green jiggly guy, all alone, scared and pantless.  'We're going streaking!' - Old School
